mapper.insert: insert into buy_history(book_price, user_id, user_email, book_title, book_author, book_isbn, book_cover, book_pubDate, book_publisher, return_period, bookCount) values (#{priceStandard} + 2500, #{user_id}, #{user_email}, #{book_title}, #{book_author}, #{book_isbn}, #{book_cover}, #{book_pubDate}, #{book_publisher}, adddate(current_timestamp, 3), 1)

insert into buy_history(book_price, user_id, user_email, book_title, book_author, book_isbn, book_cover, book_pubDate, book_publisher, return_period, bookCount) values (#{priceStandard} + 3500, #{user_id}, #{user_email}, #{book_title}, #{book_author}, #{book_isbn}, #{book_cover}, #{book_pubDate}, #{book_publisher}, adddate(current_timestamp, 3), 1)

insert into buy_history(book_price, user_id, user_email, book_title, book_author, book_isbn, book_cover, book_pubDate, book_publisher, return_period, bookCount) values (#{priceStandard} * #{bookCount}, #{user_id}, #{user_email}, #{book_title}, #{book_author}, #{book_isbn}, #{book_cover}, #{book_pubDate}, #{book_publisher}, adddate(current_timestamp, 3), #{bookCount})
mapper.update: update buy_history A INNER JOIN cart B ON A.book_title = B.book_title set A.bookCount = B.bookCount where A.book_title = #{book_title}
update buy_history A INNER JOIN cart B ON A.book_title = B.book_title set A.book_price = #{priceStandard} * B.bookCount where A.book_title = #{book_title}
